headline: Helping Banks and Hurting the Poor
abstract: The Community Reinvestment Act needs a renovation. The Trump administration instead is proposing a partial demolition.
lead_paragraph: Banks donâ€™t like lending in lower-income neighborhoods, even as they profit from deposits taken from those same communities.
